concept.title: Steam Library
concept.shortdesc: Your Library page is the primary hub where you can access all your purchased games.

conbody.p: The Library page is where all the games you own live. This is where you can install, update, launch, and uninstall your games. You can also sort, filter, search, organize, and display your games in a manner of your liking. This is also where you can access news, the Steam Workshop, community pages, and technical support for specific games you own.
